divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside my brothers room window at night smoking a ciggarette then a object all of a sudden appear very close over the roof of my house and was just gliding threw the air at first i thought it was a plane cause i see planes in the back of my house from far flying constantly every night but this one was different it was not shape like a plane in no way and had a bunch of lights lighting up, it was about 40 - 60 feet from the ground just gliding threw the air making no sounds at all and if it was a plane i always hear the engine of the planes and they are NEVER this low to the ground, this one had no sound at all coming from it, at first i was shocked at what i was seeing i literally just froze watching it fly over my house and then it continue gliding threw the air about 40-60 feet off the ground then i ran fast and called my brother and by the time we came back it was already gone.
Summary: cigar shape with lots of lights underneath it, made no sound
